hero.title: All your files in one secure location, accessible anywhere.
hero.description: Fylo stores all your most important files in one secure location. Access them wherever you need, share and collaborate with friends, family, and co-workers.

accessAnywhere.title: Access your files, anywhere
accessAnywhere.description: The ability to use a smartphone, tablet, or computer to access your account means your files follow you everywhere.

securityTrust.title: Security you can trust
securityTrust.description: 2-factor authentication and user-controlled encryption are just a couple of the security features we allow to help secure your files.

realTimeCollaboration.title: Real-time collaboration
realTimeCollaboration.description: Securely share files and folders with friends, family and colleagues for live collaboration. No email attachments required.

storeAnyTypeOfFile.title: Store any type of file
storeAnyTypeOfFile.description: Whether you're sharing holidays photos or work documents, Fylo has you covered allowing for all file types to be securely stored and shared.

productiveSection.title: Stay productive, wherever you are
productiveSection.description1: Never let location be an issue when accessing your files. Fylo has you covered for all of your file storage needs.
productiveSection.description2: Securely share files and folders with friends, family and colleagues for live collaboration. No email attachments required.

testimonialsSection.text: Fylo has improved our team productivity by an order of magnitude. Since making the switch our team has become a well-oiled collaboration machine.

earlyAccessSection.title: Get Early Access Today!
earlyAccessSection.description: It only takes a minute to sign up and our free starter tier is extremely generous. If you have any questions, our support team would be happy to help you.
earlyAccessSection.errorMessage: please enter a valid email address
